oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Resemblance between /xannan-/xannan and an ostrich. In the Katkop dialect, by Dia!kwain (L V.-23. 5858-5862). The son of /xannan-/xannan. (L V.-23. 5860 rev. and 5861 rev.). The old woman |xannan |xannan did not resemble other people: she resembled an ostrich and also walked like one. She lived at the Sak River with Dia!kwain's people, where he observed her actions firsthand.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: |xannan |xannan
